name: Samartha Vidya Prasarak Mandal

address: Swami, Trimurti Nagar, Opp. Raj Rajeshwari

briefDescription: Our organization main goal is to spread literacy in all the sectors like rural, tribal and urban. Up till now we have appointed more than 30 IT literacy center in each taluka places of Nashik, Dhule and Jalgaon district under NDLM Digital India initiative.We are the reputed Training partner of CSC e-Gov., Digital India for Maharashtra & Gujarat state and having good team size to implement training project for rural youth.Our scholarship exams, IT literacy, Training programs reached to more than 20,000 students of schools and colleges in last 3 years. We are having good database and centers in tribal and rural sector students to implement projects. Your support will improve our profile and actual implementation towards society. Thank you.
